channel.title: Hmmm..i got a weird problem with client
channel.description:
kk i tell u this whole story....
first i download a server and client i just run the server and client works i can log in ... i want to make a hamachi server so i made a hamachi name and pass me brother joined me so i change the client ip to me hamachi ip and i upload the client me brother just download the same client and he said i got error to connection but i can log in!!!..
WTF who can help me?

item.title: Hmmm..i got a weird problem with client
item.dc:creator: @spitsen spitsen
item.description:
@spitsen wrote:

i have fixed this shit!!!
the aswer HE COULD NOT PING TO ME PC BECAUSE ME FIREWALL WAS ON i just shutdown the firewall and it work .

Read full topic
item.source: Hmmm..i got a weird problem with client

item.title: Hmmm..i got a weird problem with client
item.dc:creator: @dain_bramage dain bramage
item.description:
@dain_bramage wrote:

Nice trollin’
Assuming your brother is on the same network as you (connected to the same internet), you both should be able to connect using localhost (127.0.0.1), so hamachi isn’t even needed.

Read full topic

well, ya could just not use himachi. what even is himachi?

item.title: Hmmm..i got a weird problem with client
item.dc:creator: @spitsen spitsen
item.description:
@spitsen wrote:

uhh i have this this 5 times but i only need to change the client ip to me hamahic ip right?

me source have this ip 127.0.0.1

ppl said that i dont have to change this so i dkont know what to do…

can it be to make 127.0.0.01 to localhost?

please be quick 150ppl are waiting on this…

Read full topic

item.title: Hmmm..i got a weird problem with client
item.dc:creator: @johnl17 johnl17
item.description:
@johnl17 wrote:

ok, here is what you do. RELOAD THE SERVER SOO IT STARTS WITH THE HAMACHI IP.
TO DO THIS CLOSE THE SERVER.CMD AND REOPEN IN!!!

Goodluck

Regards,
Johnl17
